name: Linkki
description:
Disconnected But Together

Move multiple players to multiple goals at the same time while still avoiding deadly hazards! All of your players move in the same direction at the same time, creating some mind-bending puzzles! 

This game was made in 48 hours and is a submission for the GMTK Gamejam 2021.


Note, the game does not work on mobile! If you get stuck, here's a guide video:

Guide Video (spoilers)

Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Reload: R
Credits:
  • SFX: Kenney.nl
  • Song: Void1gaming
  • Icons: Heroicons
  • Code: Me
